title: First Ban a 14 day ban??!?!?!
body:
I just go banned for toxic behavior in an ARAM game. First time my account has ever got reported or banned or anything. 14 days. Out of no where. My friends on my own team who had about 4x more message than me didn't even get banned or reported. Most of the messages it said were bad were to my own team anyway say like "these guys suck" you know that kind of thing. I don't understand why I got this massive ban and now it says I might get the Perma, so I guess I just wont communicate so that I cant get banned. I'm just baffled that I was the only one banned and that it was 14 days. Now I want to go report them (I don't ever report people cause I'm not a ()  ) but I cant because my account is suspended.  I mean they were saying the same thing to me. I just did not ban them right as the game ended. I know that there is probably nothing that can be don but ... And it says that I'm on of the .2 % to get banned. Like, no I'm on of the .2% to get in a game with a bunch of babies. Its just a game you don't have to report me. I don't really care at this point I don't really even play that much anyway. If anyone want to play some WOrld of WarShips while I'm banned add me a Grahamobie. (good game, highly recommend)

Hey GrahamObie,

If you want to contest your ban, you'll have to submit a [Support Ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). Escalated punishments (skipping tiers) are dealt directly by Riot after a manual review of your behavior, so it's extremely unlikely they will remove it. They only do this for extremely toxic behavior, and even then it usually takes many games of this behavior before it happens. If the other person did the same think and isn't punished yet, most likely it's because you have a history of it while they do not.

I suggest posting your reform card here, and asking for one in your support ticket if you don't have one. Be aware that having been banned you are now on the edge of punishment already, so when you come off it it will be easy to trigger the next one (a permaban). You'll need to completely change your behavior if you want to avoid it; simply mute them instead of getting toxic back. It takes 3 months for your punishment tier to drop down 1 step, and if you don't know the steps they are as follows;

* 10 game chat restriction
* 25 game chat restriction
* 14 day account ban
* Permanent account ban

They will always go in this order except in extreme circumstances. Let me know if you have any questions, and don't forget doing a support ticket if you need help from Riot.

-DTN
